mapper.select: select distinct color.sid, color.color_name, color.rgb from pcm_pro_detail as sku join pcm_product as spu on sku.product_sid = spu.sid join pcm_color_dict as color on sku.pro_color_sid = color.sid where spu.product_sid = #{spuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
